name: Zha's kitchen
description:
HELLO!

There's a lot more to do in a kitchen beside cooking. washing dishes, counting spoons and plates, or having a concert above the counter. it's up to you.

#note:
-This is just a for-fun little project for my lil sister, so expect some silliness.
-The kitchen it self modelled after my big sis's kitchen.
-I made this game using dummy sprite that i use for prototiping other project.
-This game is not very pleasing except for me actually, not even for my lil siter.
-I want to add more to this in the future, like upgrading the kitchen set and everything, but for now, i need more money (jk)
-and this is my first uploaded game ( i'm new to everything here)

btw there's no save and load. at least, yet. (but you can use f5 to save and f6 to load i believe)

art and programming: bostar

please try to enjoy, because you won't.
